name: Snowmans Dilemma (LudumDare 40)
description:
This is a puzzle game where you play a snow man and have to traverse a level before the heat tiles melt you. Where you walk and how far depends on wether or not you will survive to the end.

This game was made during LudumDare40 #LDJAM #LDJAM40

Godot was used to make this game. This was the first time i made a game for a jam with godot. I an suprisingly say that i prefer godot over unity now.
